article_title: Project SOS Handing Out Supplies To Those In Need
article_text:
Sioux Falls, SD

Volunteers will be spending Saturday handing out backpacks filled with school supplies to families in need.

The Banquet's Project SOS will be set up at Whittier Middle School Saturday from 9 a.m to 4 p.m. Supplies will be handed out to families from all schools and all school districts.

Parents must bring their children to the event with proper identification, like a social security card, birth certificate, Medicaid card, library card, or passport.

The supplies will be handed out at the school's east gym door. If you already have a backpack, you can bring it along to be filled with school supplies.
